question: 躍動
sourceMnemonic:
Every <kanji>leap</kanji> you take is a <kanji>move</kanji> filled with <vocabulary>vibrancy</vocabulary>. Your <vocabulary>dynamic movement</vocabulary> captures the essence of <vocabulary>lively motion</vocabulary>, captivating all who witness it.

<ja>躍動</ja> is not just about movement, but also about expressing internal vitality or liveliness through movements or actions. It’s commonly used as <ja>躍動感</ja> (a lively feeling).
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
